name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: mapreduce.job.speculative.minimum-allowed-tasks
description:
The minimum allowed tasks that
  can be speculatively re-executed at any time.

name: net.topology.script.number.args
description:
The max number of args that the script configured with
    net.topology.script.file.name should be run with. Each arg is an
    IP address.

name: dfs.client.socketcache.capacity
description:
Socket cache capacity (in entries) for short-circuit reads.
    If this value is set to 0, the client socket cache is disabled.

name: dfs.namenode.path.based.cache.refresh.interval.ms
description:
The amount of milliseconds between subsequent path cache rescans.  Path
    cache rescans are when we calculate which blocks should be cached, and on
    what datanodes.

    By default, this parameter is set to 30 seconds.

name: fs.s3a.connection.request.timeout
description:
Time out on HTTP requests to the AWS service; 0 means no timeout.
    Measured in seconds; the usual time suffixes are all supported

    Important: this is the maximum duration of any AWS service call,
    including upload and copy operations. If non-zero, it must be larger
    than the time to upload multi-megabyte blocks to S3 from the client,
    and to rename many-GB files. Use with care.

    Values that are larger than Integer.MAX_VALUE milliseconds are
    converged to Integer.MAX_VALUE milliseconds

name: hadoop.kerberos.min.seconds.before.relogin
description:
The minimum time between relogin attempts for Kerberos, in
    seconds.

name: dfs.default.chunk.view.size
description: The number of bytes to view for a file on the browser.
